Patch.PatchName: Change Starting Character. 00 = Mario, 01 = Luigi, 02 = Wario, 03 = Yoshi
Patch.Author: Dy

Patch.PatchName: Change Starting Lives. Replace the data with the number of lives to start with.
Patch.Author: Fiachra

Patch.PatchName: Change Starting Level. Replace the data value with the ID of the level you want loaded.
Patch.Author: Fiachra

Patch.PatchName: Change Level Loaded on 'Exit Course'. Replace the data value with the ID of the level you want loaded.
Patch.Author: Fiachra

Patch.PatchName: Hide Minigame and VS buttons on title screen
Patch.Author: Splatterboy

Patch.PatchName: Redirect VS mode to title screen
Redirect Minigame select to title screen
Remove hardcoded minimap stuff for hub
Patch.Author: Splatterboy

Patch.PatchName: Improve Working Sound Effects for Levels Using Minigame Music v2 Set Music byte 2 33(0x21) and byte 1 to 39(0x27)
Patch.Author: Skelux

Patch.PatchName: Disable Bowser's Message Upon First Entry in Castle
Patch.Author: Skelux

Patch.PatchName: All Objects Always Visible from a Distance. Causes a lot of lag, not practical if a hack contains any complex levels
Patch.Author: Skelux

Patch.PatchName: All TTC Objects Operate at a Fixed Speed Regardless of When You Enter the Level
Patch.Author: Skelux
